```typescript
export default function SearchModal({ isOpen, onClose, artistName, data, selectedSite }: EditTrackModalProps) {
    const notice = useNotice()
    const [setlists, setSetlists] = useState<Setlist[]>([])
    const [selectedSetlist, setSelectedSetlist] = useState<Setlist | null>(null)
    const [showSetlistSelection, setShowSetlistSelection] = useState(false)
    const [expandedSetlist, setExpandedSetlist] = useState<string | null>(null)
    const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false)

    const [streamingStatus, setStreamingStatus] = useState<{
        isStreaming: boolean;
        progress: number;
        total: number;
    }>({
        isStreaming: false,
        progress: 0,
        total: 0
    })

    const { isOpen: isConfirmOpen, onOpen: onConfirmOpen, onClose: onConfirmClose } = useDisclosure()

    // ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ç¦æ­¢/è¨±å¯ã®åˆ¶å¾¡

        } else {
            document.body.style.overflow = '';
        }

        return () => {
            document.body.style.overflow = '';
        };
    }, [showSetlistSelection]);

    // LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ã§å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
    const fetchLiveFansSetlists = async (artistName: string) => {
        setIsLoading(true)
        setStreamingStatus({
            isStreaming: true,
            progress: 0,
            total: 0
        })
        
        try {
            // URLä¿®æ­£ï¼ˆã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãŒã‚ã£ãŸã®ã§ï¼‰
            const url = `http://localhost:3000/api/fetch-html/livefans/stream?artist=${encodeURIComponent(artistName)}`

            const eventSource = new EventSource(url)

            const tempSetlists: Setlist[] = []
            
            // ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒŠãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®š
            eventSource.onmessage = (event) => {
                const data = JSON.parse(event.data)
                
                if (data.type === 'init') {
                    // åˆæœŸæƒ…å ±ï¼ˆåˆè¨ˆã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆæ•°ãªã©ï¼‰
                    setStreamingStatus(prev => ({
                        ...prev,
                        total: data.total
                    }))
                } else if (data.type === 'setlist') {
                    // æ–°ã—ã„ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å—ä¿¡
                    const newSetlist = data.setlist as Setlist
                    
                    // å—ä¿¡ã—ãŸã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é…åˆ—ã«è¿½åŠ 
                    tempSetlists.push(newSetlist)
                    
                    // çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’æ›´æ–°
                    setSetlists([...tempSetlists])
                    
                    // é€²è¡ŒçŠ¶æ³ã‚’æ›´æ–°
                    setStreamingStatus(prev => ({
                        ...prev, 
                        progress: tempSetlists.length
                    }))
                }
            }
            
            eventSource.onerror = (error) => {
                console.error('EventSource ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
                eventSource.close()
                setStreamingStatus(prev => ({
                    ...prev,
                    isStreaming: false
                }))
                setIsLoading(false)
            }
            
            // å®Œäº†æ™‚
            eventSource.addEventListener('complete', () => {
                eventSource.close()
                setStreamingStatus({
                    isStreaming: false,
                    progress: tempSetlists.length,
                    total: tempSetlists.length
                })
                setIsLoading(false)
            })
            
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
            setStreamingStatus({
                isStreaming: false,
                progress: 0,
                total: 0
            })
            setIsLoading(false)
            notice({
                title: 'ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼',
                description: 'ã‚‚ã†ä¸€åº¦ãŠè©¦ã—ãã ã•ã„',
                status: 'error',
            })
        }
    }

    const handleClick = async (artist: any) => {
        try {
            setShowSetlistSelection(true)
            onClose()
            setSetlists([]) // ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ

            if (selectedSite === "setlistfm") {
                setIsLoading(true)
                const response = await fetch(`${API_ENDPOINTS.SETLISTFM_SEARCH(artist.name)}`)
                const data = await response.json()

                let fetchedSetlists: Setlist[] = []

                if (data.setlist && Array.isArray(data.setlist)) {
                    data.setlist.map((item: any) => {
                        if (item.sets && item.sets.set && item.sets.set.length > 0) {
                            fetchedSetlists.push({
                                concert_name: item.tour?.name || item.artist.name,
                                date: item.eventDate,
                                venue: item.venue.name + '  (' + item.venue.city.country.name + ')',
                                concert_id: item.id,
                                song: []
                            })
                            item.sets.set.forEach((set: any) => {
                                if (Array.isArray(set.song)) {
                                    fetchedSetlists[fetchedSetlists.length - 1].song.push(...set.song);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    })
                }

                setSetlists(fetchedSetlists)
                setIsLoading(false)
            } else if (selectedSite === "livefans") {
                // å¾“æ¥ã®ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒƒãƒã§ã¯ãªãã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
                fetchLiveFansSetlists(artist.name)
            }

        } catch (error) {
            console.error('ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
            setIsLoading(false)
            notice({
                title: 'ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼',
                description: 'ã‚‚ã†ä¸€åº¦ãŠè©¦ã—ãã ã•ã„',
                status: 'error',
            })
        }
    }

    // ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯æ—¢å­˜ã®ã¾ã¾ã§å•é¡Œã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“
    // handleSetlistSelect, resetSelection, toggleSetlistExpansion, ArtistSelectionModal ...

    return (
        <>
            {/* ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹ãƒˆé¸æŠã®ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ« (Tailwindç‰ˆ) */}
            <ArtistSelectionModal />

            {/* ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆé¸æŠç”»é¢ */}
            {showSetlistSelection && (
                <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-500 via-purple-500 to-pink-500 z-50 overflow-auto">
                    <div className="min-h-screen py-8 px-4">
                        <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto">
                            {setlists.length === 0 && isLoading ? (
                                <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-screen">
                                    <div className="bg-white rounded-xl p-8 shadow-lg">
                                        <p className="text-xl font-bold text-center mb-4">ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å–å¾—ä¸­...</p>
                                        {selectedSite === "livefans" && (
                                            <div className="flex flex-col items-center">
                                                <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 mb-2">LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é †æ¬¡å–å¾—ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™</p>
                                                {streamingStatus.isStreaming && streamingStatus.total > 0 && (
                                                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-700">
                                                        é€²æ—: {streamingStatus.progress} / {streamingStatus.total}
                                                    </p>
                                                )}
                                            </div>
                                        )}
                                        <div className="flex justify-center mt-4">
                                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-indigo-500"></div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            ) : (
                                <div className="bg-white rounded-xl p-6 md:p-8 shadow-lg relative">
                                    <button
                                        onClick={resetSelection}
                                        className="absolute top-4 right-4 p-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors"
                                    >
                                        <FiX className="w-5 h-5" />
                                    </button>

                                    <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-center mb-8">
                                        ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„
                                        {selectedSite === "livefans" && streamingStatus.isStreaming && (
                                            <span className="block text-sm font-normal text-gray-500 mt-2">
                                                å–å¾—ä¸­: {streamingStatus.progress} / {streamingStatus.total}
                                            </span>
                                        )}
                                    </h2>

                                    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                                        {setlists.map((setlist) => (
                                            <SetlistCard
                                                key={setlist.concert_id}
                                                setlist={setlist}
                                                isExpanded={expandedSetlist === setlist.concert_id}
                                                onToggle={() => toggleSetlistExpansion(setlist.concert_id)}
                                                isSelected={selectedSetlist?.concert_id === setlist.concert_id}
                                                onSelect={() => handleSetlistSelect(setlist)}
                                            />
                                        ))}
                                    </div>
                                    
                                    {/* LiveFansã®ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ä¸­ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹é€²è¡ŒçŠ¶æ³ãƒãƒ¼ */}
                                    {selectedSite === "livefans" && streamingStatus.isStreaming && streamingStatus.total > 0 && (
                                        <div className="mt-6 px-4">
                                            <div className="w-full bg-gray-200 rounded-full h-2.5">
                                                <div 
                                                    className="bg-purple-600 h-2.5 rounded-full transition-all duration-300" 
                                                    style={{ width: `${(streamingStatus.progress / streamingStatus.total) * 100}%` }}
                                                ></div>
                                            </div>
                                            <p className="text-center text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2">
                                                ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å–å¾—ä¸­ ({streamingStatus.progress}/{streamingStatus.total})
                                            </p>
                                        </div>
                                    )}
                                </div>
                            )}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            )}

            {/* ç¢ºèªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ« */}
            {selectedSetlist && (
                <ConfirmModal isOpen={isConfirmOpen} onClose={onConfirmClose} setlist_id={selectedSetlist.concert_id} selectedSite={selectedSite} />
            )}
        </>
    )
}
```

æ¬¡ã«ã€ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰å´ã§ã‚‚Stream APIã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯CDK Lambdaã§å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã¯ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã®å®Ÿè£…ä¾‹ã§ã™ï¼š

```javascript
    }

    res.end();
  }
});

// ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ”ãƒ³ã‚°é–¢æ•°
async function scrapeSetlist(url) {
```

ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®å®Ÿè£…ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ”¹å–„ãŒå®Ÿç¾ã§ãã¾ã™ï¼š

1. LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆå–å¾—æ™‚ã€é †æ¬¡è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™
2. é€²è¡ŒçŠ¶æ³ãŒãƒªã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯å‡¦ç†ã®é€²æ—ã‚’ç¢ºèªã§ãã¾ã™
3. æœ€åˆã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãŒå–å¾—ã§ããŸã‚‰å³åº§ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ã€å¾…ã¡æ™‚é–“ã®ä½“æ„ŸãŒçŸ­ããªã‚Šã¾ã™
4. å…¨ã¦ã®å‡¦ç†ãŒå®Œäº†ã™ã‚‹ã¾ã§å¾…ã¤å¿…è¦ãŒãªãã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯æ—©ã‚ã«ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é¸æŠã§ãã¾ã™

ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰å´ã«ã¯ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã§ã®Stream APIå®Ÿè£…ãŒå¿…è¦ã¨ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ã“ã®æ–¹æ³•ã§ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ä½“é¨“ã‚’å¤§å¹…ã«å‘ä¸Šã•ã›ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

---

_**User**_

ç¾åœ¨ï¼ŒAPIã¯ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå®Ÿè£…ã§ã™ãŒï¼Œå†…éƒ¨å®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã‚‹ãƒ©ãƒ ãƒ€é–¢æ•°ãŒå°åˆ†ã‘ã—ã¦ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ ã¯ã§ãã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ã‹

---

_**Assistant**_

ç¾åœ¨ã®APIã®å®Ÿè£…ã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚AWSãƒ©ãƒ ãƒ€é–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°å®Ÿè£…ã«ã¤ã„ã¦èª¬æ˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

AWS Lambdaã§ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’å®Ÿç¾ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®2ã¤ã®ä¸»ãªã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼š

1. **Lambda Response Streamingï¼ˆAWS Lambda ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ï¼‰**
   - Lambdaé–¢æ•°ã‹ã‚‰ç›´æ¥ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’è¿”ã™æ©Ÿèƒ½ã§ã€2022å¹´æœ«ã«å°å…¥ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸ
   - Node.js 14.xä»¥é™ã€Python 3.8ä»¥é™ãªã©ç‰¹å®šã®ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã§ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆ
   - API Gatewayã¨çµ±åˆã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ã§ãã¾ã™

2. **EventBridge/SNS+ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆå®Ÿè£…**
   - Lambdaé–¢æ•°å†…ã§SNSã‚„EventBridgeã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦éƒ¨åˆ†çš„ãªçµæœã‚’ç™ºè¡Œ
   - ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯WebSocketã‚„Server-Sent Events (SSE)ã§å—ä¿¡

ç¾åœ¨ã®å®Ÿè£…ã‚’è¦‹ã‚‹ã¨ã€Lambdaé–¢æ•°ã¯ä¸€åº¦ã«å…¨çµæœã‚’è¿”ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚’ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°å¯¾å¿œã«å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ï¼š

```typescript
// Honoã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°å¯¾å¿œç‰ˆ
app.get('/api/fetch-html/livefans/stream', async (c) => {
    try {
        const artist = c.req.query('artist') || ''
        
        // SSEãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã®è¨­å®š
        c.header('Content-Type', 'text/event-stream')
        c.header('Cache-Control', 'no-cache')
        c.header('Connection', 'keep-alive')
        
        // ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ä½œæˆ
        const stream = new ReadableStream({
            async start(controller) {
                try {
                    // åˆæœŸãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸
                    controller.enqueue(`data: ${JSON.stringify({ type: 'init', message: 'å‡¦ç†ã‚’é–‹å§‹ã—ã¾ã™' })}\n\n`);
                    
                    // Lambdaé–¢æ•°ã¨é€šä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®WebSocketã¾ãŸã¯API Gateway WebSocketã‚’è¨­å®š
                    // ä¾‹: WebSocketã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆ
                    const ws = new WebSocket('wss://your-websocket-api.execute-api.region.amazonaws.com/stage');
                    
                    ws.onopen = () => {
                        // WebSocketãŒé–‹ã„ãŸã‚‰ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é€ä¿¡
                        ws.send(JSON.stringify({
                            action: 'getLiveFansSetlists',
                            artist: artist
                        }));
                    };
                    
                    ws.onmessage = (event) => {
                        // Lambdaé–¢æ•°ã‹ã‚‰å—ã‘å–ã£ãŸãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã«è»¢é€
                        const data = JSON.parse(event.data);
                        controller.enqueue(`data: ${JSON.stringify(data)}\n\n`);
                        
                        // å‡¦ç†ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ãŸå ´åˆ
                        if (data.type === 'complete') {
                            ws.close();
                            controller.close();
                        }
                    };
                    
                    ws.onerror = (error) => {
                        controller.enqueue(`data: ${JSON.stringify({ type: 'error', message: 'ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ' })}\n\n`);
                        controller.close();
                    };
                } catch (error) {
                    controller.enqueue(`data: ${JSON.stringify({ type: 'error', message: 'ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ' })}\n\n`);
                    controller.close();
                }
            }
        });
        
        return new Response(stream);
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error setting up stream:', error);
        return c.text('Error setting up stream', 500);
    }
});
```

Lambdaé–¢æ•°å´ã§ã¯ã€WebSocketã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦çµæœã‚’å°åˆ†ã‘ã«ã—ã¦é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼š

```javascript
// Lambdaé–¢æ•°å´ã®å®Ÿè£…ï¼ˆNode.jsï¼‰
exports.handler = async (event, context) => {
    // WebSocketæ¥ç¶šã‚’ç¶­æŒã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«context.callbackWaitsForEmptyEventLoopã‚’ç„¡åŠ¹åŒ–
    context.callbackWaitsForEmptyEventLoop = false;
    
    // WebSocketã®æ¥ç¶šæƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—
    const connectionId = event.requestContext.connectionId;
    const domain = event.requestContext.domainName;
    const stage = event.requestContext.stage;
    
    // WebSocket APIã®ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆ
    const endpoint = `https://${domain}/${stage}`;
    const apigwManagementApi = new AWS.ApiGatewayManagementApi({ endpoint });
    
    try {
        // ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ã‚¹
        const body = JSON.parse(event.body);
        const artist = body.artist;
        
        // Seleniumã®å‡¦ç†ã‚’é–‹å§‹
        // ...
        
        // ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’æ¤œç´¢ã™ã‚‹å‡¦ç†
        // ä¾‹ãˆã°10ä»¶ã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãŒã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã—ã¦
        const setlists = [/* ... */];
        
        // åˆæœŸæƒ…å ±ã‚’é€ä¿¡
        await sendToClient(apigwManagementApi, connectionId, {
            type: 'init',
            total: setlists.length
        });
        
        // å„ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å‡¦ç†ã—ã¦é †æ¬¡é€ä¿¡
        for (let i = 0; i < setlists.length; i++) {
            // Seleniumã§è©³ç´°æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—
            const setlistDetails = await getSetlistDetails(setlists[i]);
            
            // ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã«é€ä¿¡
            await sendToClient(apigwManagementApi, connectionId, {
                type: 'setlist',
                progress: i + 1,
                total: setlists.length,
                setlist: setlistDetails
            });
        }
        
        // å®Œäº†é€šçŸ¥
        await sendToClient(apigwManagementApi, connectionId, {
            type: 'complete'
        });
        
        return { statusCode: 200 };
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error:', error);
        
        // ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼é€šçŸ¥
        await sendToClient(apigwManagementApi, connectionId, {
            type: 'error',
            message: error.message
        });
        
        return { statusCode: 500 };
    }
};

// ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
async function sendToClient(apigwManagementApi, connectionId, data) {
    try {
        await apigwManagementApi.postToConnection({
            ConnectionId: connectionId,
            Data: JSON.stringify(data)
        }).promise();
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error sending message to client:', error);
        if (error.statusCode === 410) {
            // ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒåˆ‡æ–­ã•ã‚ŒãŸå ´åˆ
            throw new Error('Client disconnected');
        }
        throw error;
    }
}
```

ã“ã®å®Ÿè£…ã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®èª²é¡ŒãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼š

1. **AWSã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ•ãƒ©ã®å¤‰æ›´ãŒå¿…è¦**: API Gatewayã§WebSocketã‚’ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«è¨­å®šå¤‰æ›´ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™

3. **Seleniumå‡¦ç†ã®åˆ†å‰²**: ã‚»ãƒ¬ãƒ‹ã‚¦ãƒ å‡¦ç†è‡ªä½“ã‚’å°åˆ†ã‘ã«ã—ã¦çµæœã‚’éƒ¨åˆ†çš„ã«è¿”ã™å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™

ã‚ˆã‚Šç°¡æ˜“ãªã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒã¨ã—ã¦ã¯ã€Lambdaé–¢æ•°å†…ã§æ¤œç´¢çµæœã‚’å–å¾—ã—ãŸå¾Œã€è©³ç´°æƒ…å ±ã®å–å¾—ã‚’ä¸¦åˆ—å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã€çµæœãŒæƒã†ã”ã¨ã«SQSã‚„SNSã‚’é€šã˜ã¦é€šçŸ¥ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã‚‚è€ƒãˆã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯å®šæœŸçš„ã«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã—ã¦æ–°ã—ã„çµæœã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹æ–¹å¼ã¨ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

å®Ÿè£…ã®é›£æ˜“åº¦ã¨ç¾åœ¨ã®ã‚¢ãƒ¼ã‚­ãƒ†ã‚¯ãƒãƒ£ã‚’è€ƒæ…®ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€å®Œå…¨ãªãƒªã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒãŒç¾å®Ÿçš„ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼š

2. ã‚‚ã—ç›´æ¥ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚’ä¿®æ­£ã§ããªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰å´ã§URLã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã‚‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼š

```typescript
// config.tsã‚’ä¿®æ­£
export const API_ENDPOINTS = {
  // ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹ãƒˆæ¤œç´¢
  ARTIST_SEARCH: `${API_BASE_URL}/api/artist/search`,

  // SetlistFM
  SETLISTFM: (setlistId: string) => `${API_BASE_URL}/api/setlistfm/${setlistId}`,
  // ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã®æ§‹é€ ã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¦ã€:idã¨åŒºåˆ¥ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã™ã‚‹
  SETLISTFM_SEARCH: (artistName: string) => `${API_BASE_URL}/api/setlistfm-search?artist=${artistName}`,

  // LiveFans
  LIVEFANS: (setlistId: string) => `${API_BASE_URL}/api/livefans/${setlistId}`,
  LIVEFANS_SEARCH: (artistName: string) => `${API_BASE_URL}/api/livefans-search?artist=${artistName}`,
};
```

ãã—ã¦ã€ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰å´ã§ã¯å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’æ–°ã—ãè¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

```typescript
app.get('/api/setlistfm-search', async (c) => {
  // ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹ãƒˆåã§SetlistFMã‹ã‚‰ä¸€è¦§ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
  const artist = c.req.query('artist');
  // ...å‡¦ç†...
  return c.json(setlists);

  // ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹ãƒˆåã§LiveFansã‹ã‚‰ä¸€è¦§ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
```

ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®å¤‰æ›´ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ç«¶åˆã‚’å›é¿ã—ã€æ­£ã—ã„ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ãŒè¡Œã‚ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ­ã‚°ã§è¦‹ãŸã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ç¾çŠ¶ã§ã¯`fetch_html`ãŒIDã¨ã—ã¦è§£é‡ˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã®å„ªå…ˆé †ä½ã‚’ä¿®æ­£ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§å•é¡ŒãŒè§£æ±ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

_**User**_

ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®è©³ç´°è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã§ï¼Œã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆFMã‹ã‚‰ã®å–å¾—ã¯setlistæ§‹é€ ä½“ã«songãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§æ›²åãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ãŒï¼ŒLivefansã®å ´åˆï¼Œsongã¾ã§ã¯APIã‹ã‚‰å¸°ã£ã¦ããŸã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼ãã®ãŸã‚ï¼Œè©³ç´°ã‚’æŠ¼ã—ãŸã¨ãã«ï¼ŒAPIã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã—ã¦èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ãŸã„ã§ã™ï¼ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã¯æ‹¡å¼µã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã‚¹ãƒ”ãƒŠãƒ¼ã§ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™

_**Assistant**_

LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆè©³ç´°ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ãŸéš›ã«ã€APIã‹ã‚‰æ›²æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã—è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã¾ãšã€é–¢é€£ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ã€Œã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã€æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’æ”¹å–„ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯æ™‚ã«APIã¸æ›²æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é€ä¿¡ã—ã€ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ä¸­ã¯ã‚¹ãƒ”ãƒŠãƒ¼ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹ã«SearchModal.tsxã®ä¿®æ­£ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ææ¡ˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

```typescript
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'
import { useDisclosure, useNotice, } from '@yamada-ui/react'
import { FiCheck, FiX, FiChevronDown, FiChevronUp, FiUser } from 'react-icons/fi'
import ConfirmModal from './ConfirmModal'
import { API_ENDPOINTS } from '../../config';

type EditTrackModalProps = {
    isOpen: boolean
    onClose: () => void
    artistName: string
    data: any
    selectedSite: string
}

type Song = {
    name: string
}

type Setlist = {
    concert_name: string
    date: string
    venue: string
    concert_id: string,
    song: Song[]
}

// ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
const ArtistCard = ({ artist, onClick }: { artist: any, onClick: () => void }) => {
    return (
        <div
            className="flex items-center p-4 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
            onClick={onClick}
        >
            {artist.images && artist.images[0] ? (
                <img
                    src={artist.images[0].url}
                    alt={artist.name}
                    className="w-16 h-16 rounded-lg object-cover mr-4"
                />
            ) : (
                <div className="w-16 h-16 rounded-lg bg-gray-200 flex items-center justify-center mr-4">
                    <FiUser className="w-8 h-8 text-gray-400" />
                </div>
            )}
            <span className="font-bold text-lg">{artist.name}</span>
        </div>
    );
};

// ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
const SetlistCard = ({
    setlist,
    isExpanded,
    onToggle,
    isSelected,
    onSelect,
    selectedSite,
    loadSongsForSetlist
}: {
    setlist: Setlist,
    isExpanded: boolean,
    onToggle: () => void,
    isSelected: boolean,
    onSelect: () => void,
    selectedSite: string,
    loadSongsForSetlist: (setlistId: string) => Promise<void>
}) => {
    const [isLoadingSongs, setIsLoadingSongs] = useState(false);

    const handleToggle = async () => {
        // LiveFansã®å ´åˆã¯æ›²æƒ…å ±ã‚’å‹•çš„ã«å–å¾—
        if (selectedSite === "livefans" && !isExpanded && (!setlist.song || setlist.song.length === 0)) {
            setIsLoadingSongs(true);
            await loadSongsForSetlist(setlist.concert_id);
            setIsLoadingSongs(false);
        }
        onToggle();
    };

    return (
        <div className="border border-gray-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm overflow-hidden h-auto">
            <div className="p-4 bg-white">
                <div className="font-bold text-lg mb-3 text-center">{setlist.concert_name}</div>

                <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
                    <div className="space-y-2 text-left">
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">æ—¥ä»˜: {setlist.date}</p>
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">ä¼šå ´: {setlist.venue}</p>
                    </div>

                    <button
                        onClick={(e) => {
                            e.stopPropagation();
                            onSelect();
                        }}
                        className={`inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-sm ${isSelected
                            ? 'bg-green-500 text-white'
                            : 'bg-purple-500 text-white hover:bg-purple-600'
                            } transition-colors`}
                    >
                        {isSelected && (
                            <FiCheck className="mr-1" />
                        )}
                        {isSelected ? 'é¸æŠä¸­' : 'é¸æŠ'}
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>

            {isExpanded && (
                <div className="bg-gray-50 p-4 border-t border-gray-200">
                    {isLoadingSongs ? (
                        <div className="flex justify-center py-4">
                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-6 w-6 border-b-2 border-indigo-500"></div>
                            <span className="ml-2 text-sm text-gray-500">æ›²æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ä¸­...</span>
                        </div>
                    ) : setlist.song?.length > 0 ? (
                        <div className="space-y-1">
                            {setlist.song.map((song, index) => (
                                <p key={`${setlist.concert_id}-${index}`} className="text-sm">
                                    {index + 1}. {song.name}
                                </p>
                            ))}
                        </div>
                    ) : (
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">æ›²æƒ…å ±ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“</p>
                    )}
                </div>
            )}

            <button
                onClick={handleToggle}
                className="w-full py-2 px-4 bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors flex items-center justify-center border-t border-gray-200"
            >
                <span className="mr-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
                    {isExpanded ? 'ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹' : 'ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤º'}
                </span>
                {isLoadingSongs ? (
                    <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-4 w-4 border-b-2 border-indigo-500"></div>
                ) : isExpanded ? (
                    <FiChevronUp className="w-5 h-5 text-gray-500" />
                ) : (
                    <FiChevronDown className="w-5 h-5 text-gray-500" />
                )}
            </button>
        </div>
    );
};

export default function SearchModal({ isOpen, onClose, artistName, data, selectedSite }: EditTrackModalProps) {
    const notice = useNotice()

    const [setlists, setSetlists] = useState<Setlist[]>([])
    const [selectedSetlist, setSelectedSetlist] = useState<Setlist | null>(null)
    const [showSetlistSelection, setShowSetlistSelection] = useState(false)
    const [expandedSetlist, setExpandedSetlist] = useState<string | null>(null)

    const { isOpen: isConfirmOpen, onOpen: onConfirmOpen, onClose: onConfirmClose } = useDisclosure()

    // ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ç¦æ­¢/è¨±å¯ã®åˆ¶å¾¡
    useEffect(() => {
        if (showSetlistSelection) {
            document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
        } else {
            document.body.style.overflow = '';
        }

        return () => {
            document.body.style.overflow = '';
        };
    }, [showSetlistSelection]);

    const handleClick = async (artist: any) => {
        try {
            setShowSetlistSelection(true)
            onClose()

            if (selectedSite === "setlistfm") {
                const response = await fetch(`${API_ENDPOINTS.SETLISTFM_SEARCH(artist.name)}`)
                const data = await response.json()

                let fetchedSetlists: Setlist[] = []

                if (data.setlist && Array.isArray(data.setlist)) {
                    data.setlist.map((item: any) => {
                        if (item.sets && item.sets.set && item.sets.set.length > 0) {
                            fetchedSetlists.push({
                                concert_name: item.tour?.name || item.artist.name,
                                date: item.eventDate,
                                venue: item.venue.name + '  (' + item.venue.city.country.name + ')',
                                concert_id: item.id,
                                song: []
                            })
                            item.sets.set.forEach((set: any) => {
                                if (Array.isArray(set.song)) {
                                    fetchedSetlists[fetchedSetlists.length - 1].song.push(...set.song);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    })
                }

                setSetlists(fetchedSetlists)
            } else if (selectedSite === "livefans") {
                const response = await fetch(`${API_ENDPOINTS.LIVEFANS_SEARCH(artist.name)}`)
                const fetchedSetlists: Setlist[] = await response.json()
                setSetlists(fetchedSetlists)
            }

        } catch (error) {
            console.error('ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error);
            notice({
                title: 'ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼',
                description: 'ã‚‚ã†ä¸€åº¦ãŠè©¦ã—ãã ã•ã„',
                status: 'error',
            })
        }
    }

    // LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®æ›²æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
    const loadSongsForSetlist = async (setlistId: string) => {
        try {
            // ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆè©³ç´°APIã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã™
            const response = await fetch(`${API_ENDPOINTS.LIVEFANS(setlistId)}`)
            const data = await response.json()
            
            // å–å¾—ã—ãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§è©²å½“ã™ã‚‹ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’æ›´æ–°
            setSetlists(prevSetlists => 
                prevSetlists.map(setlist => 
                    setlist.concert_id === setlistId 
                        ? { ...setlist, song: data.songs || [] } 
                        : setlist
                )
            )
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆè©³ç´°ã®å–å¾—ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ:', error)
            notice({
                title: 'ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼',
                description: 'ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆè©³ç´°ã®å–å¾—ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ',
                status: 'error',
            })
        }
    }

    const handleSetlistSelect = (setlist: Setlist) => {
        setSelectedSetlist(setlist)
        onConfirmOpen()
    }

    const resetSelection = () => {
        setShowSetlistSelection(false)
        setSetlists([])
        setSelectedSetlist(null)
    }

    const toggleSetlistExpansion = (id: string) => {
        if (expandedSetlist === id) {
            setExpandedSetlist(null);
        } else {
            setExpandedSetlist(id);
        }
    };

    const ArtistSelectionModal = () => {
        if (!isOpen) return null;

        return (
            <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen px-4 text-center">
                    <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 transition-opacity" onClick={onClose}></div>

                    <div className="inline-block w-full max-w-2xl p-6 my-8 overflow-hidden text-left align-middle transition-all transform bg-white shadow-xl rounded-2xl z-50">
                        <div className="flex justify-between items-start mb-4">
                            <h3 className="text-xl font-bold leading-6 text-gray-900">
                                {artistName} ã®æ¤œç´¢çµæœ
                            </h3>
                            <button
                                onClick={onClose}
                                className="p-1 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors"
                            >
                                <FiX className="w-5 h-5" />
                            </button>
                        </div>

                        <div className="max-h-[60vh] overflow-y-auto mt-4">
                            {data && data.artists && data.artists.items && data.artists.items.length > 0 ? (
                                <div className="space-y-3">
                                    {data.artists.items
                                        .filter((artist: any) => artist.name)
                                        .map((artist: any) => (
                                            <ArtistCard
                                                key={artist.id}
                                                artist={artist}
                                                onClick={() => handleClick(artist)}
                                            />
                                        ))}
                                </div>
                            ) : (
                                <p className="text-center text-gray-500 py-4">
                                    ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹ãƒˆãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸ
                                </p>
                            )}
                        </div>

                        <div className="mt-6 flex justify-end">
                            <button
                                type="button"
                                className="px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none"
                                onClick={onClose}
                            >
                                ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        );
    };

    return (
        <>
            {/* ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¹ãƒˆé¸æŠã®ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ« (Tailwindç‰ˆ) */}
            <ArtistSelectionModal />

            {/* ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆé¸æŠç”»é¢ */}
            {showSetlistSelection && (
                <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-500 via-purple-500 to-pink-500 z-50 overflow-auto">
                    <div className="min-h-screen py-8 px-4">
                        <div className="max-w-6xl mx-auto">
                            {setlists.length === 0 ? (
                                <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-screen">
                                    <div className="bg-white rounded-xl p-8 shadow-lg">
                                        <p className="text-xl font-bold text-center mb-4">ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å–å¾—ä¸­...</p>
                                        {selectedSite === "livefans" && (
                                            <div className="flex justify-center">
                                                <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¯ã€ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®å–å¾—ã«æ™‚é–“ãŒã‹ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚</p>
                                            </div>
                                        )}
                                        <div className="flex justify-center mt-4">
                                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-indigo-500"></div>
                                        </div>

                                    </div>


                                </div>
                            ) : (
                                <div className="bg-white rounded-xl p-6 md:p-8 shadow-lg relative">
                                    <button
                                        onClick={resetSelection}
                                        className="absolute top-4 right-4 p-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors"
                                    >
                                        <FiX className="w-5 h-5" />
                                    </button>

                                    <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-center mb-8">ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„</h2>

                                    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                                        {setlists.map((setlist) => (
                                            <SetlistCard
                                                key={setlist.concert_id}
                                                setlist={setlist}
                                                isExpanded={expandedSetlist === setlist.concert_id}
                                                onToggle={() => toggleSetlistExpansion(setlist.concert_id)}
                                                isSelected={selectedSetlist?.concert_id === setlist.concert_id}
                                                onSelect={() => handleSetlistSelect(setlist)}
                                                selectedSite={selectedSite}
                                                loadSongsForSetlist={loadSongsForSetlist}
                                            />
                                        ))}
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            )}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            )}

            {/* ç¢ºèªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ« */}
            {selectedSetlist && (
                <ConfirmModal isOpen={isConfirmOpen} onClose={onConfirmClose} setlist_id={selectedSetlist.concert_id} selectedSite={selectedSite} />
            )}
        </>
    )
}
```

å®Ÿè£…ã®ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼š

1. `SetlistCard`ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã«`isLoadingSongs`ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ã€ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ä¸­ã®è¡¨ç¤ºã‚’åˆ¶å¾¡ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

2. `loadSongsForSetlist`é–¢æ•°ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã€ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯æ™‚ã«LiveFansã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆè©³ç´°APIã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

3. LiveFansã®å ´åˆã®ã¿ã€ã€Œã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ãŸéš›ã«è©³ç´°æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã®é–“ã¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã‚¹ãƒ”ãƒŠãƒ¼ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

4. å±•é–‹ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆéƒ¨åˆ†ã«ã‚‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ä¿®æ­£ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

```typescript
const scrapeLiveFansDetails = async (setlistId: string) => {

        // CORSå¯¾ç­–ã®ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚­ã‚·ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ï¼ˆã¾ãŸã¯è‡ªå‰ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚­ã‚·ã‚’ç”¨æ„ï¼‰

                    is_cover: false,

    }
```

```typescript
    setlist,
    isExpanded,

    isSelected,
    onSelect,

    loadSongsForSetlist

    isSelected: boolean,

}) => {
    const [isLoadingSongs, setIsLoadingSongs] = useState(false);

    const handleToggle = async () => {
        // LiveFansã®å ´åˆã¯APIå‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ã‚’ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—ï¼ˆç¾åœ¨ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ï¼‰

                setIsLoadingSongs(false);

                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">ä¼šå ´: {setlist.venue}</p>

                            ? 'bg-green-500 text-white'
                            : 'bg-purple-500 text-white hover:bg-purple-600'

                            <FiCheck className="mr-1" />
                        )}
                        {isSelected ? 'é¸æŠä¸­' : 'é¸æŠ'}
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>

                    {isLoadingSongs ? (
                        <div className="flex justify-center py-4">
                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-6 w-6 border-b-2 border-indigo-500"></div>
                            <span className="ml-2 text-sm text-gray-500">æ›²æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ä¸­...</span>
                        </div>

                        <p className="text-sm text-red-500">{error}</p>
                    ) : selectedSite === "livefans" ? (
                        <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                            ç¾åœ¨ã€APIã®å•é¡Œã«ã‚ˆã‚Šæ›²æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
```

```typescript
// æ—¥ä»˜å¤‰æ›é–¢æ•°ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
const formatJapaneseDate = (dateStr: string): string => {
  // dateStrã¯ "08-05-2025" å½¢å¼ï¼ˆDD-MM-YYYYï¼‰
  if (!dateStr) return '';
  
  // åˆ†å‰²ã—ã¦å¹´æœˆæ—¥ã«åˆ†ã‘ã‚‹
  const parts = dateStr.split('-');
  if (parts.length !== 3) return dateStr;
  
  const day = parseInt(parts[0], 10);
  const month = parseInt(parts[1], 10);
  const year = parseInt(parts[2], 10);
  
  // JavaScriptã®Dateå‹ã«å¤‰æ›ï¼ˆæœˆã¯0å§‹ã¾ã‚Šãªã®ã§-1ã™ã‚‹ï¼‰
  const date = new Date(year, month - 1, day);
  
  // æ›œæ—¥ã®é…åˆ—
  const weekdays = ['æ—¥', 'æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ'];
  const weekday = weekdays[date.getDay()];
  
  // æ—¥æœ¬èªå½¢å¼ã«æ•´å½¢
  return `${year}å¹´${month}æœˆ${day}æ—¥ï¼ˆ${weekday}ï¼‰`;
};

// handleClické–¢æ•°å†…ã§ã®ä½¿ç”¨
if (data.setlist && Array.isArray(data.setlist)) {
    data.setlist.map((item: any) => {
        if (item.sets && item.sets.set && item.sets.set.length > 0) {
            fetchedSetlists.push({
                concert_name: item.tour?.name || item.artist.name,
                date: formatJapaneseDate(item.eventDate), // æ—¥æœ¬èªæ—¥ä»˜å½¢å¼ã«å¤‰æ›
                venue: item.venue.name + '  (' + item.venue.city.country.name + ')',
                concert_id: item.id,
                song: []
            })
            item.sets.set.forEach((set: any) => {
                if (Array.isArray(set.song)) {
                    fetchedSetlists[fetchedSetlists.length - 1].song.push(...set.song);
                }
            });
        }
    })
}
```

ã“ã®å¤‰æ›´ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€`item.eventDate`ã®ã€Œ08-05-2025ã€å½¢å¼ã®æ—¥ä»˜ãŒã€Œ2025å¹´5æœˆ8æ—¥ï¼ˆæœ¨ï¼‰ã€ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå½¢å¼ã«å¤‰æ›ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚æ—¥ä»˜ã¯ã€ŒDD-MM-YYYYã€å½¢å¼ã¨ã—ã¦è§£æã•ã‚Œã€æ—¥æœ¬èªè¡¨è¨˜ã«å¤‰æ›ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

- setlistfmã‹ã‚‰è¿”ã•ã‚Œã‚‹æ—¥ä»˜å½¢å¼ãŒã€ŒDD-MM-YYYYã€ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’å‰æã¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
- ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒä¸æ­£ç¢ºã¾ãŸã¯å½¢å¼ãŒç•°ãªã‚‹å ´åˆã®å®‰å…¨ç­–ã¨ã—ã¦ã€å¤‰æ›ã§ããªã„å ´åˆã¯å…ƒã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’ãã®ã¾ã¾è¿”ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
